mapper.select: SELECT mrp.id, mrp.product_id productId, bsp.product_name productName, mrp.shop_count shopCount, ( mrp.shop_count * bsp.sell_price ) totalPrice FROM dj_maintenance_record_product mrp, dj_basics_storefront_product bsp WHERE mrp.product_id = bsp.id AND mrp.maintenance_record_id=#{maintenanceRecordId}
